description: This is an exciting opportunity for and experienced Entertainer & Musicians Touring Agent to be responsible for the management of client travel logistics including air, hotel, ground transportation, meet and assist, and private charters for touring clients.  Skills needed for success:  2+ years Travel Agent experience  Strong knowledge of airfares, contracted fares, ticketing, exchanges  Prior GDS experience (Apollo/Galileo preferred)  Top-notch customer service handling VIP clients  Microsoft Office proficiency  Excellent verbal and written communication skills  Organized, ability to multitask and work well under deadlines Job 11279
